live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.

54171.summary: Some customers in the Whitehorn area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
54171.title: Oct 12 - Calgary (Whitehorn) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
